response.original_title: Elvis: All The Kings Men Volume 4
response.overview: Fourth of six interview sessions with the core members known as the Memphis Mafia. VOL 4: The King Comes Back. In this 4th video you'll see and hear why Elvis was becoming dissatisfied with his "cookie-cutter" roles in his movies. Musical styles were changing, an Elvis yearned for a return to his roots. Hear about the historic meeting with the Beetles. Lean why Elvis demanded (and got) a private mecting with President Nixon! Hear first hand accounts of the death threats on Elvis' Life and how the "Memphis Mafia" worked with the FBI to protect the King..
response.title: Elvis: All The Kings Men Volume 4
